1091910.name: PonGlow
1091910.description:
PonGlow is a fast paced survival arcade game where you compete against the world and your friends in a bid to achieve the best score. PonGlow has a randomised level generator so you will never get the same game twice. What score can you get?

Features

-Different themes from Egyptian Pharaohs to candy galore
-Collect health and shields to last longer.
-Randomised level generator.
-Progressive difficulty.
-Stat tracking to let you know how many blocks you hit and more.
-Fast paced action from start to finish.
-Unlock new blocks and more from levelling up.
-Compete with your friends and the world to achieve the best score.
-Over 100 unique blocks
1091910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
